parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If you have no special requirements, leave this parameter empty.**

The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: SourceURI
parameters.description:
The OSS URI of the image object.

Specify the OSS URI in the oss://${Bucket}/${Object} format, where `${Bucket}` is the name of the bucket in the same region as the current project and `${Object}` is the path of the object with the extension included.
